short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to the ah cacao network automatically. As soon as the login page pops up the extension tries to connect to the network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop entering your access code every time and connect to the cacao Network automatically. In order to use the extension - the connect page has to be opened with Google Chrome!
